```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(PackageExampleR)
```

In this tutorial we will see how different animals say `Hello world!`.

First, we can see the cow:
```{r}
"cow" |>
  my_hello_world() |>
  cat()
```

Then we have the whale:
```{r}
"whale" |>
  my_hello_world() |>
  cat()
```

Finally, this is the stegosaurus:
Then we have the whale:
```{r}
"stegosaurus" |>
  my_hello_world() |>
  cat()
```
